title: Menthi Akku Pappu/ Menthi dal tadka/ Fenugreek leaves dal
content:
Ingredients: Toor Dal - 1/2 cup Fenugreek/ Menthi leaves - 1 cup Green chillies - 5 Onion chopped - 2 tb sp Tomato chopped - 1 cup Red chilli powder - 1/2 tb sp Turmeric - 1/2 tea spoon Garlic cloves chopped - 1 tb sp Salt - As per taste For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • In pressure cooker add toor dal/ kandi pappu wash twice with water and drain
  • Now add washed fenugreek/ menthi leaves and 1/4 teaspoon of turmeric in it
  • Cook for 3 whistles. Dal must be mashy
  • On other side heat frying pan/ deep fry pan with medium heat
  • Now add tempering in it
  • Let it splutter
  • Next add garlic and saute till color changes to brownish
  • Next add green chillies and onion saute for about one minute
  • Add chopped tomato pieces in it , cover it with a lid for 2 to 3 minute. It is well cooked when the tomato pieces become smooth
  • Immediately add salt, turmeric powder and red chilli powder in it. SauteÂ for one minute
  • Add mashed Menthi/ fenugreek leaves and toor dal in the pan
  • Let it cook for 3 to 5 mins
  • Step by step process shown in the below picture
  • Serve it in a bowl. Enjoy with Rice/ Roti's
